timeline_marilyn:
5:55 pm - arrived at party
6:30 pm - Went upstairs to get air on patio
7:00 pm - Returns to dining room for dinner
7:40 pm - Starts towards Library to look at painting. Notices Sebastian heading upstairs
7:50 pm - Learns of murder in Dining Room
notes_marilyn:
- conspicuous and flamboyant lady
- seems sort of unnerving beneath the public persona
 - didn't know the victim well
timeline_sebastian:
4:00 pm - arrived at party
5:50 pm - Started greeting guests
6:15 pm - Went to kitchen to help staff
7:00 pm - Arrives in dining room with food and staff
7:30 pm - returns to kitchen for cleanup
7:45 pm - learns of murder from Victoria
notes_sebastian:
- claims to barely know victim
- claims to have been hired last minute
- wasn't properly informed about guest count or health concerns
- seems agitated
timeline_roman:
5:45 pm - arrives at party and starts chatting with guests
6:20 pm - Goes to game room to play cards with Vincent
6:55 pm - starts back towards dining room
7:00 pm - eats dinner with Marilyn
7:30 pm - goes with Victoria upstairs
7:45 - learns of murder while talking to Sebastian
notes_roman:
- most well-to-do guest here
- said he lost big time to Vincent in poker
- claims it was all in good fun though
- seems remorseful
